title: Karl Schorn
text:
Karl (Carl) Schorn (16 October 1803, <a href="D%C3%BCsseldorf">Düsseldorf</a> – 7 October 1850, <a href="Munich">Munich</a>) was a German painter and <a href="chess%20master">chess master</a>.
He was a member of the <a href="Berlin%20Pleiades">Berlin Pleiades</a> (the seven stars of German chess) in the first half of the 19th century.
